HomePage.working_message: Working day & night to bring out the best results
HomePage.description_first_home: UIC Games is a game development company founded in 2018. It focuses on creating engaging and immersive video games, combining technology with creative storytelling to deliver unique gaming experiences
HomePage.story_description1: UIC Games is a team of passionate storytellers, imaginative artists, and technology masters.
HomePage.story_description2: Our talented team of developers, designers, and creatives strives to push the boundaries of interactive gaming and innovation.
HomePage.game_description: Gamification of great historical campaigns and key moments that played significant roles in the destinies of humanity for a great commander and statesman will explode your everyday routine!
HomePage.services_description: We provide integrated development solutions aimed at creating engaging and interactive experiences that enhance engagement, learning, and entertainment across various platforms and applications.

game_development.title: Game Development
game_development.description: We constantly push the boundaries of creativity and technology to deliver unique and inspiring experiences.

service_game_box.description_game_service1: We offer expert development services for desktop games, delivering engaging gameplay and immersive experiences tailored to your vision
service_game_box.description_game_service2: Our mobile game development services create captivating and user-friendly experiences that engage players on-the-go
service_game_box.description_game_service3: We design immersive VR experiences that allow users to explore interactive, virtual environments, perfect for entertainment or educational purposes
service_game_box.description_game_service4: We develop realistic simulators that provide interactive, hands-on experiences for education, training, and exhibition purposes
service_game_box.description_game_service5: Our gamification services integrate engaging game elements into large-scale solutions, enhancing user interaction and motivation across various platforms

praktikum_box.title: practikum
praktikum_box.glav_description1: At UIC Games, we are passionate storytellers, visionary artists, and technical wizards dedicated to creating unforgettable gaming experiences. With a relentless commitment to innovation, we craft immersive worlds where players can lose themselves in epic adventures and compelling narratives.
praktikum_box.glav_description2: Our team of talented developers, designers, and creatives come together to push the boundaries of what's possible, delivering games that resonate with players around the globe. Join us on this journey as we redefine the future of interactive entertainment.
praktikum_box.praktikum_monthDesc1: Build a strong foundation in game development through theoretical lessons.
praktikum_box.praktikum_monthDesc2: Gain hands-on experience and real-world skills from industry professionals
praktikum_box.features_general_desc: This practicum provides hands-on experience and insights for aspiring game developers to enhance their skills.
praktikum_box.features_globalization_desc: Join projects for competitive  games and prepare for the global market
praktikum_box.features_employement_desc: Gain valuable experience with a 1 year contract, launching your career in tech
praktikum_box.study_desc: Deepen your knowledge and expertise through focused learning and hands-on experience, advancing your skills for success in the industry.
praktikum_box.learn_basic_desc: Build a strong foundation by mastering core principles and essential skills, setting the stage for future growth and success in the industry.
praktikum_box.make_desc: Showcase your skills and accomplishments by creating a standout portfolio, demonstrating your expertise and creativity to potential employers or clients.
praktikum_box.professionalMentor_desc: Gain insights and guidance from experienced mentors through personalized support and masterclasses, helping you refine your skills and achieve your career goals.
praktikum_box.workTema_desc: Collaborate effectively in team environments, developing your communication and teamwork skills while working on real projects that have the potential to be showcased to a broader audience.
praktikum_box.schoolarShip_desc: We believe in supporting talent. This practicum offers a $14,000 grant, distributed  among selected students to help them fully immerse in the experience. Whether  itâ€™s for software, project resources, or personal development, this financial support ensures you have what you need to excel.

info_bots.info_bot_desc1: You can enter your information and register for the exam by going to a special Telegram bot using the button below
info_bots.info_bot_desc2: After registration, you will take a special exam in the following areas:
info_bots.info_bot_desc3: Then an interview will be held to check the English language level of the candidates who have passed the exam.
info_bots.info_bot_desc4: The interview will be conducted in English. The minimum required level is B1
info_bots.info_bot_desc5: Finally, candidates are tested on their soft skills and hard skills through an offline interview
info_bots.info_bot_desc6: Based on the results of the offline interview, of the practicum will be selected

HomePage.work_free_title: Feel free to reach out and join our team
HomePage.test_Launch: The site is in test mode

about_page.description_about: At UIC Games, we are passionate storytellers, visionary artists, and technical wizards dedicated to creating unforgettable gaming experiences. With a relentless commitment to innovation, we craft immersive worlds where players can lose themselves in epic adventures and compelling narratives. Our team of talented developers, designers, and creatives come together to push the boundaries of what is possible, delivering games that resonate with players around the globe. Join us on this journey as we redefine the future of interactive entertainment.
about_page.description_innovation: We constantly push the boundaries of creativity and technology to deliver groundbreaking experiences that captivate and inspire.
about_page.description_passion: Our love for gaming drives everything we do. We pour our hearts into each project, ensuring every detail reflects our dedication to the craft.
about_page.description_collaboration: We believe in the power of teamwork. Our team works through combining unique perspectives to create something extraordinary.
about_page.description_quality: Excellence is our standard. We are committed to delivering polished, high-quality games that exceed player expectations.
about_page.description_creativity: We embrace bold ideas and encourage out-of-the-box thinking, fostering a culture where imagination thrives.
about_page.description_growth: We are committed to continuous learning and improvement, always seeking new ways to enhance our skills and evolve with the industry.
about_page.about_ourcompany: Our company provides a broad spectrum of services in the field of game development and provides a learning ground for any talented youth willing to conquer the game industry.

work_opportunity.desc_title_requirements2: Knowledge of testing methodologies and understanding of the software development lifecycle.
work_opportunity.desc_title_requirements3: Experience writing test cases and test plans.
work_opportunity.desc_title_requirements4: Understanding the basics of test automation and experience working with automation tools (e.g. Selenium, Appium, JUnit, TestNG).
work_opportunity.desc_title_requirements5: The desire to learn new technologies and testing methodologies.
work_opportunity.desc_title_requirements6: Knowledge of software testing theory (methods, techniques);
work_opportunity.desc_title_conditions3: Working with a professional team to develop interesting projects
work_opportunity.desc_title_conditions4: Friendly and supportive atmosphere in the team, regular team events, team building, including marathons and quizzes
work_opportunity.desc_title_conditions5: The company is proud to provide its employees with the most modern and high-quality equipment for work
work_opportunity.desc_title_conditions6: A modern office with work facilities
work_opportunity.desc_title_conditions7: Timely payment of labor, including a system of bonuses for outstanding results
work_opportunity.desc_title_conditions8: Employment in accordance with the Labor Code of the Republic of Uzbekistan
